name: Training Protocol BUG-2608
description:
Game Description

The training protocol is there to train agents how to find BUG's that hides amongst other agents. B.U.G. means Big, Unknown, Green monsters. Be careful not to eliminate the wrong agents because that means what you've eliminated "is not a BUG". You only have one chance so make it count.

Gameplay

Use the mouse to eliminate the agent that you think is the BUG. Use the help of the hint on the left side to determine who the BUG is. Rack up some scores and fight for a hiscore.

Backtrace Link
